verses.verse: Now it <S%H1961>came<s%> about on the <S%H3117>day<s%> that <S%H4872>Moses<s%> had <S%H3615>finished<s%> <S%H6965>setting<s%> up the <S%H4908>tabernacle,<s%> he <S%H4886>anointed<s%> it and <S%H6942>consecrated<s%> it with <S%H3605>all<s%> its <S%H3627>furnishings<s%> and the <S%H4196>altar<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> its <S%H3627>utensils;<s%> he <S%H4886>anointed<s%> them and <S%H6942>consecrated<s%> them also.

Then the <S%H5387>leaders<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> the <S%H7218>heads<s%> of their fathers' <S%H1004>households,<s%> <S%H7126>made<s%> an <S%H7126>offering<s%> (they were the <S%H5387>leaders<s%> of the <S%H4294>tribes;<s%> they were the ones who were <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H6485>numbered<s%> men).

When they <S%H935>brought<s%> their <S%H7133>offering<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H6632>covered<s%> <S%H5699>carts<s%> and <S%H8147>twelve<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H1241>oxen,<s%> a <S%H5699>cart<s%> for [every] <S%H8147>two<s%> of the <S%H5387>leaders<s%> and an <S%H7794>ox<s%> for each <S%H259>one,<s%> then they <S%H7126>presented<s%> them <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H4908>tabernacle.<s%>
Then the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H3947>"Accept<s%> [these things] from them, that they may be <S%H5647>used<s%> in the <S%H5656>service<s%> of the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting,<s%> and you shall <S%H5414>give<s%> them to the <S%H3881>Levites,<s%> [to] <S%H376>each<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H6310>according<s%> to his <S%H5656>service.<s%>"
So <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H5699>carts<s%> and the <S%H1241>oxen,<s%> and <S%H5414>gave<s%> them to the <S%H3881>Levites.<s%>
<S%H8147>Two<s%> <S%H5699>carts<s%> and <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H1241>oxen<s%> he <S%H5414>gave<s%> to the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1648>Gershon,<s%> <S%H6310>according<s%> to their <S%H5656>service,<s%>

and <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H5699>carts<s%> and <S%H8083>eight<s%> <S%H1241>oxen<s%> he <S%H5414>gave<s%> to the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H4847>Merari,<s%> <S%H6310>according<s%> to their <S%H5656>service,<s%> under the <S%H3027>direction<s%> of <S%H385>Ithamar<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron<s%> the <S%H3548>priest.<s%>

But he did not <S%H5414>give<s%> [any] to the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H6955>Kohath<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> <S%H5921>theirs<s%> <S%H1992><s%> [was] the <S%H5656>service<s%> of the <S%H6944>holy<s%> [objects, which] they <S%H5375>carried<s%> on the <S%H3802>shoulder.<s%>

And the <S%H5387>leaders<s%> <S%H7126>offered<s%> the <S%H2598>dedication<s%> <S%H7133>[offering<s%>] for the <S%H4196>altar<s%> <S%H3117>when<s%> it was <S%H4886>anointed,<s%> so the <S%H5387>leaders<s%> <S%H7126>offered<s%> their offering <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H4196>altar.<s%>

Then the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> "Let them <S%H7126>present<s%> their <S%H7133>offering,<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H5387>leader<s%> <S%H259>each<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> for the <S%H2598>dedication<s%> of the <S%H4196>altar.<s%>"

Now the one who <S%H7126>presented<s%> his <S%H7133>offering<s%> on the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> [was] <S%H5177>Nahshon<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5992>Amminadab,<s%> of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah;<s%>
